trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Huber Heights
There was one other sighting in Huber Heights on or around August 25th 2002
Summary: A spinning multicolored rotating upsidedown triangle.
divs: sighting detailsi had left home to get something to eat at mcdonald's,after i had ordered my food. i had looked up,for the spinning movement caught my attention. as i had looked right at it,it had sat motionless about 100 feet up,right directly above the bp gas sign. all of a sudden when the lady cashiere came to the window to ask for payment of the food; i had looked away from it for a second to pay for the food,it was gone. i fear god almighty,god allpowerful. i thank him for everything. p.s. i live close to fairborn,ohio. home of wright patterson\afb. yours truley (name deleted)fg.
